updates.title: Live Beatnik Raffle
updates.description: Enter our live Beatnik raffle for a chance to win visa gift cards throughout the night!

updates.title: Fall Beatnik 10/17
updates.description: Get excited for our first Beatnik of the year!
updates.details: Join us at 7:30 EST to hear amazing performances, participate in live raffles, and jam to jazz!
